programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Outside In: Lost in Academia
programme.desc: Norwegian sociolinguist Goran Vaage investigates Japanese laughter, or warai. He analyzes how comedy is ingrained into communication in everyday life and plays a vital role in social connection.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Murase Hidehiro trains search-and-rescue dogs to save lives in disaster areas around the world. He talks about the importance of having dogs that are specifically able to respond to disasters in Asia.

programme.title: DOSUKOI Sumo Salon 5 minutes
programme.desc: This is a move that can be used either for defense or offense. We take a deep dive into how it works and how it's been employed throughout sumo history to trip up even fearsome opponents!

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, a famous swordsmith's blade that was cherished by the shoguns who ruled Edo-period Japan.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: The Piercing Gaze
programme.desc: A man strikes a pose in an iconic woodblock print by the artist Sharaku. Who is the mysterious figure... and what is he doing? And why did the artist want to commemorate the moment?

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Nishino Masatoshi didn't know what he wanted to do with his life until he learned about horse logging. Now, he's chasing his dream in the forests of Hokkaido with the help of his trusty sidekick, Kap.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Summer #5
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Interest in sleep has been growing in Japan. From futuristic high-tech beds to advanced sleepwear, many new products are designed to improve sleep quality. We look at Japan's latest sleep trends.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: Across the country, Japan's railways are working towards a shared goal: carbon neutrality. See the efforts being made to shift away from diesel power and to improve energy efficiency overall.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Kyoto dominated the oil market 1000 years ago. Various oils fueled votive lamps, flavored food, preserved wood, and were used in pomade and cosmetics. Oil still plays a key role in the culture today.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 16
programme.desc: Lorelei Martins returns, determined to find out if Red John had a role in her sister's death, and Jane is forced to confess to Lisbon his part in Lorelei's prison escape.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 5
programme.desc: A shady character named "Ice Tray" (guest star Don Cheadle – "Ocean's Thirteen"), one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, comes to Bel-Air for a visit.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. They all share the spotlight with our cast of hilarious comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Britt!

programme.title: Smallville S1 19
programme.desc: Clark confronts an unexpected foe when a talented art student, Justin Gaines (ADAM BRODY), returns to school after being hit by a car.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 10
programme.desc: Michael wows mall shoppers with snakes that soothe and spiders that stitch, and at an art supply store, a woman finds out that she's a natural-born wood whittler. Plus, an abandoned house won't let go of its precious things.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 11
programme.desc: At a yard sale, Michael helps a man realize his amazing mind powers and shocks a college student by discovering she's the heir to the entire lot. Later, an art gallery's tribal mask goes missing and has the security guard fearing war!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. They all share the spotlight with our cast of hilarious comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Britt!

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 5
programme.desc: A shady character named "Ice Tray" (guest star Don Cheadle – "Ocean's Thirteen"), one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, comes to Bel-Air for a visit.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 5
programme.desc: Mandy struggles to get Georgie’s family to join him for his first Thanksgiving without his dad. YOUNG SHELDON’s Zoe Perry, Raegan Revord, Annie Potts and Craig T. Nelson guest star.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 19
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke find out that poo on the shoe isn't good luck, and Brooke tests some hacks for her pup. Plus, learn some hacks to go undercover when the Cold-Blooded Hacker tries to swipe some bling.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 20
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke test your hacks for smelly kitty litter, Kevin makes a flute out of a carrot in a new segment of Let's Make a Thing, and our Hack Line of Defense will have a testy bridezilla walking down the aisle in no time.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Get your credit cards ready, because TruTV is coming at you with 20 all new inventions that will both horrify and delight! We've got a loop to make pooping in the woods even more exciting, a way to cool your man parts for optimal baby making, and asound system for the great beyond that will blow the lid off of your coffin. Supplies may be limited, but the jokes from our cast sure aren't, featuring Judy Gold, Jared Logan, and Bryan Callen.

programme.title: Smallville S1 20
programme.desc: After Lana gains the ability to see through other people’s eyes, Clark and Lana race to find Chloe after Lana "watches" her being buried alive.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 7
programme.desc: Jesse taunts Brandon and Lori in the hopes of instigating a fight and later unearths a ticking treasure. Then, seasoned local Victor throws down his bankroll for a trove of luxury goods, but are they actually knock-offs? And later, Brandon and Lori think they've hit the jackpot with a cache of firearms, but when Lori's gun accidentally goes off inside the locker, Brandon is caught in the crosshairs.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 8
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori return to Boston and square off against his former protege Wade. The bad blood may just erupt into a full-out brawl on the auction floor. Then, a former military hero goes all in on a locker that turns out to be hiding the ultimate score. And later, the contents of a unit spark an outrage among the buyers, but Brandon only sees dollar signs. Will he walk away or will this controversial cache crush his morals?

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 2)
programme.desc: A quick stop for gas turns into a parent's worst nightmare when a 6 year old boy is snatched during a carjacking. Tess and Jake race against the clock to bring the child home alive as Sunny pours all her focus away from her trauma and into the case. When Tess and Jake track down the perp in a tense OJ style pursuit, Tess's empathy defuses a potentially deadly standoff, reuniting the boy safely with his family and prompting her to reflect on her own family history. Meanwhile, Sunny fights back intrusive thoughts with self-defense classes, and Matt seems to be ready to move on from Tess— but who is he dating…?

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 2)
programme.desc: During a routine interview at a chemical plant, Tess and Leo are trapped by a gunman looking to kill the plant’s manager. Tess and Leo's attempt to evacuate the target and other workers safely is cut short when Leo is shot and injured, leaving Tess and Sunny to outsmart the gunman, escape the lockdown, and save the day. With unexpected help from Matt and Mia, Sunny guides Tess around the highly flammable plant to save Leo's life and uncover the gunman’s motive before he blows them all up. Tess and Sunny are both blindsided by unsettling news as Lucas shares plans to get married, and Sunny finally uncovers Rigby’s secret.

programme.title: L'Afrik En Contes

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.
